item.title: Software Engineer Career
item.description: Basic Data Bits Bytes Endianness Category Integer unsinged signed Decimal float number double number quad number Characters (code unit based) Encoding ascii unicode code unit length: usc2, usc4 code unit encoding: utf-8, utf-16, utf-32 Color: RGB bit depth (or bit per channel) channel (RGB = 3 channels) level (2^n, n = bit depth, per channel) pixel depth (or color depth, or bpp) Sound: (TODO) Bucket Category Picutre Music Text File Archive Padding, Alignment Remember/Memory volatile register memory stack heap (unmanaged memory) managed memory (often referred to GC managed heap) non-volatile HDD SSD Action Computing Scalar Vector Branch if…else if…else switch pattern matching (frequently appearing recently) Loop for loop while do…while foreach (frequently appearing recently) Memory Control Read Write Communication Node to Node, Total two nodes Network Topolgy, More than two nodes Start Ring Mesh Bus Hybrid Internet Model OSI model TCP model Protocol MAC address IP IPv4 IPv6 (TODO) TCP UDP Phyiscally Programming Language Compiled Language Without GC C C++ With GC Java C# Golang Dart Interpreted language Python Bash Powershell Domain Specific language (DSL)
